name: 2 Bubble 2 Bobble
description:
Group assignment for Teesside University module 'Game Jam'. This game was made by Team Uncommon using Unreal Engine 4.21 mainly developed in C++.

In this project I was the Producer and the Gameplay Programmer developing the items, power ups and animations.

Read more at: luisrodrigoroldan.wixsite.com/rodrigoroldan
